partintro.para: This part discusses administrative concepts and techniques for the Dataphor platform. This part is intended for Dataphor administrators, although much of the material will be useful to developers wishing to gain a better understanding of the concrete elements of the Dataphor environment. Developers that understand the production environment completely are more likely to produce applications that function efficiently and effectively in a deployment scenario.

chapter.title: Deployment and MaintenanceAdministrationDeployment and MaintenanceDeployment and Maintenance
